name: model
description: class describing a geometry model (several methods are available)

properties.name: geometryFileType
properties.description: Type of the geometry file. Only options are ''lowOrderPanel'' and ''stepFile''.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position and attitude of the geometry in the local coordinate system of the BODY that owns this geometry.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: Identifier of the geometry in the calculation module.
